mapper.select: select * from(select rownum as rn, a.* from(select * from movie where opendt >= (sysdate-30) order by mno asc) a) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
select count(*) from movie where release = #{cMovie}
select count(*) from movie where release = #{eMovie}
mapper.update: update [테이블] set subhead = #{subhead}, content=#{content}, poster=#{poster}, trailer = #{trailer} where title = #{title}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie(movieCd, title, ftitle, grade, openDt) VALUES(#{movieCd}, #{title}, #{ftitle}, #{grade}, #{openDt})
